highlights.title: Highlights
highlights.info: Discover what makes the Wikipedia Quiz Generator exceptional: dynamic quiz creation, multilingual support, intelligent search, seamless AI integration, and meticulous design. Experience reliable performance and precision in every feature.

dynamic_quiz.title: Dynamic Quiz Generation
dynamic_quiz.desc: Leverage AI and Wikipedia to generate engaging, topic-specific quizzes that adapt to your needs, enhancing user engagement and learning.

inclusive_design.title: Inclusive Design for All Users
inclusive_design.desc: Our app is designed to cater to a wide range of users, allowing anyone to explore and pique their interest in a variety of topics.

multilingual_support.title: Support for 9 Languages
multilingual_support.desc: Offer quizzes in nine languages including English, Spanish, French, Japanese, Chinese, and more, ensuring accessibility for a global audience.

intelligent_search.title: Intelligent Search
intelligent_search.desc: Utilize intelligent search functionality to precisely target topics, providing users with relevant and accurate quiz content from millions of Wikipedia articles.

ai_integration.title: Seamless AI Integration
ai_integration.desc: Integrate effortlessly with leading AI APIs such as OpenAI and Perplexity, ensuring cutting-edge performance and capabilities.

meticulous_design.title: Precision in Every Detail
meticulous_design.desc: From the frontend built with React and TypeScript to the backend powered by .NET 8 and PostgreSQL, every component is meticulously crafted for optimal performance.
